reviews.review_text: A great hotel at a very good location for a reasonable price. Rooms are simple (for instance, the living room was pretty bare) but are well maintained and cleaned daily. I stayed in a suite at a high floor. It offered an unblocked view of the Vancouver suburbs, with minimal tall buildings blocking the view. Safety: Surrounding neighbourhood is safe. Walkability: Crystal Mall has a lot of Asian (specifically Chinese) shops and eateries. Metropolis at Metrotown is within walking distance and offers a huge selection of shopping (e.g. Walmart and Canadian Superstore). Food & drinks: Breakfast buffet service is available for a fee and the spread is decent, certainly on par with Hilton breakfasts.

We just returned from our stay and could not be happier with our hotel experience.  This location was perfect for our needs. Several great restaurants across the street and the concierge did a great job helping us find everything.  The hotel rooms were spacious and clean. Prices were very reasonable.  This was a family trip to see Vancouver and we are so happy we chose this hotel.

The rooms are clean, the bathtubs are amazing. We stayed there the night of our wedding and it was great We misses breakfast and the lady in the kitchen made us breakfast anyway. Have a super nice the staff like above and beyond to make sure we were comfortable. Walkability: Super close to metrotown and the sky train, making it very accessible and in a great location Food & drinks: The omelets were amazing. The kitchen stuff was helpful and incredibly kind

Had a great stay here. Room was clean and comfortable, we had a suite which was nice. The Breakfast Buffet included for Gold Members was very good, lots of options. Location is super convenient next to the Skytrain (easy ride downtown) and malls/shopping. Price was a lot cheaper than staying downtown but still well located. Parking wasnt too bad for an urban area. Only complaint is one morning, I think they only had one elevator running, and we literally waited on our floor for an elevator for about 15 minutes (5 minutes for the first which was already full, then another 10 for the second which had room). But I think that was a short lived problem, the rest of the stay we didnt have any issues.

Super clean and friendly staff. Not super conveniently located but they do have a few restaurants downstairs at the Crystal Mall. Parking is underground and confusing. This might be my new hotel when I visit BC The restaurant in the hotel(3rd floor) is also pretty good. The staff there are also super friendly.

Wonderful hotel to stay in. The room was clean, the beds were comfortable. The bathroom was spacious and clean as well. There was a microwave in our room, which was a great plus to reheat any of the food we bought back as leftovers from downstairs in the Crystal Mall! The hotel itself is situated in a great town center with many different shopping centers surrounding it and malls within walking distance, as well as easy access to public transportation to get downtown. My only issue were the two days in a row of an unexpected wake up call of the fire alarms going off at 6:30am. Even so, I would stay here again and do highly recommend it for anyone looking for a hotel to stay in!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jacklyn, Thank you for the great comments, we are leased you enjoyed your stay! Sorry about the fire alarms, we have brought the monitor company in to inspect the system to ensure that will not happen again. Cheers, Michael

reviews.review_text: Since our arrival all the staff we met was very pleasant, especially at the reception (night time) and Tinny from housecleaning service. She was nice, efficient and very polite! The room is very clean. I will definitely come back.

We used the Hilton Vancouver Metrotown as a place for our wedding guests to stay. A big thank you to Elaine for setting up our wedding block. The process was smooth and easy. A link was given for our guests to book rooms directly and of course calling in was an option as well. Our guests enjoyed staying at Hilton Metrotown and venturing out in the surrounding area from the mall to the restaurants & shops. Such a nice area. Highly recommend Hilton Vancouver Metrotown!

My overall experience was amazing. Liza at the front desk was very friendly and looked after my needs. The hotel staff who brought up some extra towels were very kind and helpful. The room was a bit dusty, but that is completely okay as we did not need to reach those areas. The part that may have been a downside is the parking gates as one has to go around to make sure you are at the hotel gates as the other is for the mall which closes at a specific time. The front desk agent was very helpful when we called to make sure how to get back in. Our view was from the 12th floor, so it really had an amazing view and walking distance from Metropolis mall and connected to the Crystal Mall for convenience.

Loved our stay here! I took my mom to B.C. for her birthday but wanted a location that wasn t directly downtown. This location is perfect because it s a 2 minute walk to the Metropolis Mall. It s also a 5 minute walk from the Skytrain, in a nice area. The staff at this location were amazing, very kind and attentive. When heading back to the airport we had an Uber cancel on us, however staff acted swiftly and we had a taxi in less than a minute (no joke). The rooms were very clean and tidy, with daily cleaning available. I would definitely stay here again! Safety: Very safe. Walkability: 2 mins from the Metropolis Mall, 5 min from Skytrain - everything you need is all in on one block.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your kind comments Sharnica, So glad you and your Mom had a great stay and happy belated birthday to her! Cheers, Michael

reviews.review_text: Stayed here for our church group conference. Phoned downstairs asking for extra towels. No one showed up. They know that there would be four people staying there and only put three towels.

The Hilton Vancouver Metrotown is incredible centrally located, well looked after and the staff are excellent. I worked with Jennifer Yolanda at the Sales Team for my booking and she was incredible attentive and detail oriented. Would highly recommend for any stay or meeting booking. Noteworthy details: Spacious meeting rooms for a variety of booking needs

Everything from check-in, room stay, to check-out was great and deserved a 9.9 stars/10. However, it was a false alarmed fire evacuation that we have to give less stars due to the hotels lack of leadership and direction in helping guests to evacuate safely. My family had to stay in the middle of the fire escape stair well (in 12th Floor) to help a helpless handicapped person with no hotel personnel around to help him.  Our two teenage kids were finally able to help this person to safety on ground floor outside the front door. On a bright side, we would like to recognize one of the hotels reception hostesses, Ms. Chloe Duong, who has been very exemplary and went above and beyond her duties to offer us more guides & travel tips about your great city as well as pointing us to other Hilton facilities in Canada for our next travels.  She has represented Hilton well and we have been most impressed with her professionalism, poise, and cheerful positive attitude.  She has earned a 5/5 stars rating from us! Nearby activities: The hotel is next a a shopping mall which offers great convenience!

From the moment we walked in, the Front Desk and Concierge were very friendly and accommodating! We arrived before check-in time as we had an early flight in and the Front Desk was able to check us in early and find a great room for us, also we felt welcomed as Diamond members. Rooms were very spacious and clean! Housekeeping staff greeted us every morning. Great selection at the breakfast buffet and our waiter was very friendly as well. Location was also really close to Metrotown station, the mall, and yummy food nearby. Overall amazing service all around which made our stay one of the best weve had!

Ive stayed here a handful of times now and I have no complaints. (Full disclosure, I am a Diamond member with the brand). Breakfast is delicious, the complimentary upgrades are always wonderful, and I love having access to a hot tub whenever I stay. The location is the perfect walking distance to the SkyTrain, so I can zip into downtown Vancouver without the price of staying downtown Vancouver.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Amelia! We appreciate your comments and being a Diamond Member!  See you again soon. Cheers, Michael

reviews.review_text: Beautifully maintained hotel. Super staff all friendly and helpful. Rooms are spacious, very clean, very comfortable beds. Restaurant and bar are great, food and drinks much better than typical hotel fare. Executive Lounge on 18th floor. Nearby activities: Attached to Crystal Mall, a large mostly Chinese related shopping and dining center with a huge supermarket and food court. Other shopping and dining within a couple of blocks. Walkability: So much nearby, easy walking in the neighborhood including several parks Food & drinks: Hotel restaurant serves a very nice breakfast buffet, and the dinner menu has good variety. Food is not just heated up fare but well crafted and prepared. Cocktails from the bar are excellent.

Excellent hotel close to many restaurants...easy parking! Very clean & well maintained rooms and common areas! Great water pressure in the shower! Rooms: Very clean Safety: Very safe area Walkability: Easy to access nearby restaurants Food & drinks: Breakfast was amazing...smokey bacon!

Best location. Visiting from USA and this area was super convenient to all the touristy attractions (20-30)min away from hikes and the mall is 5 min walk. Special thank you to Rupama who checked us in and gave us the best advice on which restaurants and attractions to go to. As a Hilton Honors member, I wish all Hiltons were ran and staffed like this one.
Amazing hotel, great service and great food. Also includes free access to their 3 heated pools and gym. The big shopping centre is a 2 minute from the hotel itself. Would definitely recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Lqckq, Appreciate the great comments and we look forward to hosting you again soon. Cheers, Michael

reviews.review_text: Raj is amazing! He helped make our stay enjoyable: helped with EV parking and charging and room upgrade as a Hilton member. Thank you!

Overall very good, room very spacious and clean and shampoo, conditioner, body wash were good value, parking was bit far and hard to find. Rooms: very spacious Nearby activities: Metrotown is very close.

I don t have any negative comments. I m a regular here and I always get awesome service. The staff are so helpful and caring.  When I get to the hotel my bag is already in my room waiting for me.  The hotel is further away from the job location but well worth it.  The restaurant on site is really great too.  Everyone feels like family to me.  I would highly recommend.  A special kudos to the front desk. Always going above and beyond for me.

I came here on a work trip. The location is perfect: 5 minute walk from the skytrain and minutes from shopping & restaurants. Hotel service was excellent at check-in and out. I didnt use any amenities, housekeeping or room service, so I cannot comment on those. They do provide a discount ($10 off) for the breakfast ($30) but I didnt use it nor did I go to the restaurant. The room was very clean and spacious. I had requested a king bed but received 2 queens (my work booked the room so not sure if there had been a communication-issue at that step). I liked the blackout curtains and found the room mostly quiet - you could hear the skytrain but not my neighbours. The AC/heating fan was loud but that just may be something they do to drown out any other possible noise. Overall, a very nice place to stay.

I had a nice stay at the Hilton Metrotown. The location is excellent. 5 mins walk away from the closest metro station, and you were in Downtown Vancouver in 15-20 minutes via a direct Skytrain. There were lots of food options around the hotel as well, and the hotel has a nice open-air swimming pool and hot tub. The rooms and washrooms were clean and spacious, and the beds were very comfortable. Being a Gold member of Hilton Honors makes a big difference when staying at this hotel, as otherwise breakfast is not included. However, the breakfast was very basic and did not have too many options.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We value you as a Hilton Honors member and are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay and our fantastic location, Rafay. Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding the breakfast, as we appreciate guest input. We hope we can provide a perfect visit for you in the future!

reviews.review_text: Still a great hotel... nice rooms, great views, friendly staff, convenient location near Metrotown.  Highly recommended
Nice and clean rooms. Very good location in Burnaby close to restaurants and mall. Rooms: Very clean and comfortable.

Friendly staffs. Clean hotel. Beautiful atmosphere inside and outside around that part of the city. Walking distance to everything downtown. Nice comfy rooms, we enjoyed the small pool and hot tubs. We had dinner at the restaurant and the food is good. We will come again!
Beautiful hotel with friendly and helpful staff. Great location. Rooms: Beautiful and clean rooms. Rooms : 5/5 |

We recieved a room upgrade with a separate  bedroom with a king bed and 60 TV ! No complaints here, other than the windows on the room can not be opened to let a little fresh air in. TONS of fine restaurants within 5 min walking distance.  Weird that this Hilton doesnt have valets service like in Downtown Vancouver, but still easy to deal with. Would definitely recommend and would return.
Always enjoy my stay at the Hilton by Metrotown, only thing that could make it better would be an indoor hot tub and sauna.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thankyou Tyrant, So pleased to have you as a regular with us! Cheers, Michael

reviews.review_text: Excellent hotel with heated pool. next to metropolis Mall and skytrain. It has everything you need.
We stayed here pre-COViD and I have all good things to say about the hotel. Very conveniently located, courteous staff and hence, our stay was very pleasant.

You cannot beat the Hilton Metrotown for location and excellent service. it is equidistant between downtown and growing businesses to the east. I have stayed there for the past 10 years with the exception of COVID period: the staff is friendly aware of my needs and will go out of their way to accommodate.

We have had the pleasure to stay here before and love the location for a shopping getaway! Walking distance to Metrotown Mall ! The front desk team and breakfast team were amazing! Even checked with us right after check-in to make sure everything was great! Hope to be back soon!
Very nice property with a convenient location. A SkyLink train station is less than a 10 min walk. The staff were top notch especially Chloe that checked me in. Great views from the hotel also.
Great service, great food, very clean. Would be nice if you cover the pool and hot tub area. Other than that great accommodation.

We had the double queen bed booking with a splendid view of the neighborhood. Free wifi. Overnight parking was $21. Theres a fitness studio on the 3rd floor equipped with treadmills, free weights, and a bench. There are cloth towels, wipes, and a filtered water fountain. Access the Crystal mall from the 2nd floor .

This hotel was LOVELY! The security was really on top of things and made me feel very secure. The rooms were very clean and accomidating. Beds were excellent! Feather duvets are an excellent touch. The front desk attendants were kind, warm and welcoming. It was a lovely stay!

Location wise you cant beach this hotel and hotels around metro town station. I choose this hotel primarily due to higher room cost in Vancouver city this summer. I felt this Hilton hotel provided good value in comparison. And the Vancouver metro system is a very good way to get around for my needs. Although I have to say the car park was a bit confusing at first. Hotel has great rooms. Seems to be new. I liked the room facilities. Everything was great. Breakfast was nice. Service was good but can be iffy when it is super busy. One day I had to wait for coffee for a long time. Would be better if there is self service. The staff are running up and down as it was super busy. Club lounge is small, I dont know how they will be able to deal with the influx of guests when it is fully operational again. Overall a great hotel if you need to be in Vancouver area. Highly recommended.

As a wedding photographer, I had a chance to photograph a few weddings there. I loved the stylish ballroom spaces and an outdoor terrace suitable for outdoor photos. I also enjoyed the catering service.
Stat here because nowhere else had a room great room and service but very pricey

From the time we arrived for our overnight stay the staff were extremely friendly and helpful, they go above and beyond, they accommodated our every need with enthusiasm and made our experience a great pleasure. The rooms were clean and comfortable, the grounds were immaculate and the staff were all professional. I will definitely visit and book without hesitation at another Hilton.

An excellent hotel with an exceptional staff, amazing service and excellent amenities. I want to recognize Neha at the front desk for her wonderful demeanor and abilities to make me feel welcome and important. The breakfast was delicious, good location, nice hot tub. I only wish the pool was bigger and covered.  My favorite hotel in Burnaby!

Stayed here on a Business Trip this week for 4 nights. From the moment I checked in this property exceeded my expectations. The staff and service is exceptional! Liza is a true gem! Rooms felt recently renovated and we re cleaned and tidied daily, I had a 1 King 2 room suite thanks to being a Diamond. I did not experience the Buffet Breakfast as I left for work super early. Liza arranged a bagged breakfast that also exceeded expectations, I cannot be appreciative enough. Executive Lounge is currently opened for Coffee/Espresso Juice/Soft Drinks etc but was told it will be back to the Canape, Breakfast, and Alcohol previous offered soon! Will definitely stay here again
Excellent hotel to stay at.  The staff here were extremely attentive and caring to guests  needs.  Will stay here again!

Everyone here was so friendly.   Our room was upgraded and was a fantastic room!!  The food was great and got to know Steve when we went to the restaurant for evening drinks.  Gave us great ideas on what to do around Vancouver.  We would live to come back to this hotel in the future!!  Thank you for taking such great care of us!!!

I chose this hotel after flight disruptions had me stuck in Vancouver. The service was exceptional and they were readily able to accommodate two extensions as details of the weather disruptions changed. They were kind and helpful and even left a small gift on Christmas morning.

Great stay overall! Warm service, shoutout to Massimo, who was able to quickly resolve a duplicate reservation issue that I found out only a day before I arrived due to an issue with Hiltons (not the hotel itselfs) reservation system. The room was large and clean (although the lamps and the washroom felt a bit dated). The Hilton apps floor plan was very handy as I was able to choose a room with extra floor space with good views thanks to the buildings interesting shape and layout. The digital key also worked well. The location is excellent - an Asian food court is literally downstairs (has an amazing dim sum place) and very close to the SkyTrain station for a ride to downtown. I tried the hotels breakfast once and found it to be pleasant with friendly service from the breakfast room staff, albeit overpriced ($30) compared to similar hotels Ive stayed at so I didnt think it was worth having breakfast there twice. Overall would still highly recommend.

We just attended a dance event here two weeks ago and the venue is great. The staff were incredibly helpful both during the event and front desk in accommodating our needs. Extremely friendly. The location itself is prime as its nearby Metrotown Mall, but just across the street are nice restaurants, coffee shop and Crystal Mall with assortment of Asian cuisine.

The Hilton Vancouver Metrotown and their team are amazing! We had our wedding ceremony  and reception at the Hilton and their attention to detail and working with us was easy, smooth and worry free. From our first interaction with Jackie we knew we had chosen the right venue. She was efficient and very quick getting back to us with email questions and by the end of the wedding and reception we  were even below budget and with her help and assistance our dream wedding came true. The chef and his team out did themselves and the meal selection for our cocktail hour and reception left our guests asking for more! Jackie is a true professional and would highly recommend her and her team. Thank you for making our dream come true. Charlene and Ranj.
Little far from the downtown but just a few steps for metrown mall and subway station. A lot of cafe and good options of a different restaurants so near. Rooms
Nicely situated, great customer service, clean room. Petfriendly its a must for us and our fur babies was Welcome.

Good location, clean rooms , freindly staff specially Massimo who checked me in who was great and Stky Fong and Bing Liu the evening shift who really tried to be accomodating and were very nice. The only proble was that there were no smart tv so you could not connect your phone and stream which I think is a must.   I have amazon prime and netflix which I could not use.   But at othere hotels tgey usually have it.

Our corporate group recently stayed at Hilton Vancouver Metrotown for a business meeting. We occupied over 50 rooms, used their meeting facilities and F&B services. The hotel was lovely, staff was even better, and everything went off without a hitch. Thank you to the HVM team for a well-executed stay.

I was very happy with my stay at the Hilton. The rooms were a good size, with large TV and decent size fridge. One of the key reasons why this hotel does well is its staff, even accommodating my over sized truck by parking it in the loading zone area (for extra fee). With limited parking in the area, this was very beneficial with anyone driving in with large trucks. The breakfast was a step up compared to many other hotels I have stayed at. Coming to the hotel for business, Anthony (one of the managers) made sure my stay met all my needs and expectations, which is why I would recommend this hotel to many of my associates for business stays.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Mohammad! We really appreciate the wonderful feedback and will make sure to share this with Anthony as well. We are so very pleased you enjoyed yourself and that the team took such great care of you. We look forwar to hosting you again soon. Cheers, Michael

reviews.review_text: The customer service at this place is exceptional. We arrived close to midnight with no reservation - there was a noisy party upstairs at home, and we just wanted to sleep. They were super friendly and checked us in quickly. The morning desk staff were equally friendly, and the hotel had a complimentary breakfast station set up because the adjoining restaurant is temporarily closed - like, thats going above and beyond. There are plenty of food places in walking distance, but they went out of the way to make things easier for guests. As we were leaving, a smiling custodian warned us about a coffee spill at the bottom of the escalator so we wouldnt step in it. Right down to the very last person we had contact with as we left, everyone was at that high level of customer care. I mean the rooms are great, but I needed to call out the awesome staff!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Pam, Thank you so much for your kind words with the interactions you had with our team members during your stay with us. I am glad to read that everyone took great care of you and look forward to welcoming you back soon. Chris

reviews.review_text: We stayed for 9 nights, uppon arrival we had a chat with the striking workers who were not realy friendly. Hotel staff took care of the problem and were realy helpful during the whole stay. We would have loved to get the breakfast buffet but the grab and go breakfast was just fine, infact our kids loved it. The room was clean and staff gave us new towels uppon request. I would recommend this hotel.
The hotel staff were so kind and welcoming. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay, and wish it couldve been for longer. Everything was excellent. If we come back to Metro, well be back at this Hilton.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Chris for the feedback. Look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

reviews.review_text: The staff at Hilton Metrotown went above and beyond for me at every opportunity. The rooms were flawlessly clean and comfortable. I cannot recommend this hotel highly enough. Thank you to the staff, especially Steve and Elaine, for the absolute best service I have ever encountered in a hotel.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Liisa! We are so pleased you had such a wonderful experience with us!  We truly appreciate your comments and will make sure to share your praises with Elaine and Steve! Thanks again and we look forward to hosting you soon. Cheers, Michael

reviews.review_text: I spent a lovely evening at this hotel. The hotels basic accommodations were fine -- clean, comfortable, what youd expect. The staff, on the other hand, were outstanding. Ive never been to a hotel where so many people seemed to be in such a consistent good mood. Everybody took the time to chat with my young son, everybody seemed happy to help out. Whatever the management is doing at this hotel, keep it up. You have an excellent staff.

A wonderful place to stay. The front desk people were always friendly and amazing. When we first arrived, our room smelt a little off, we called down to the desk and  they moved us to a new room that smelt clean! They even came up to our floor and helped us move over. My only complaint, and this might be because I am not a resident of Vancouver. I dont think you should charge your guests for parking. Work it into your room prices or something. An extra $20 to park my car a night, was a little bit of a drag. Other hotels in your area supply free parking. Perhaps something to think about. Thank you again for the amazing stay though!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you U iBbi for your great comments! We are pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciate your comments regarding the parking and we will review with our leadership team. We look forward to hosting you again soon. Cheers, Michael

reviews.review_text: I stay at the Hilton Metrotown every week for work. The staff are amazing, and the rooms are large and spotless. Breakfast has lots of options. I have stayed in many of the rooms, all have excellent views of the city. Will be back next week!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Jayme s! We truly appreciate your comments and look forward to seeing you again soon! Safe travels, Michael

reviews.review_text: Decent rooms,  deep bath tub. Helpful and friendly staff.  Excellent location. Strange that the cold water taps had hot water running through it. Once you run cold water tap for a while, it does eventually  get cold.

Stayed here for a night. Staff were very warm and welcoming! Super helpful too! I arrived early and they allowed an early check-in which I appreciated! The hotel is well-maintained and clean. The indoor gym is very nice and my room was very clean!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Cindy, Happy to hear you enjoyed your stay!  And wanted to let you know that if you liked our rooms now, wait until we are done our room refresh!  Hopefully you are able to return and enjoy them again. Cheers, Michael Director of Operations

reviews.review_text: At last!  A hotel that actually understands what it is selling.  Sleep. The room was dimly lit in general which is my fave.  The curtains covered the ENTIRE window and they even overlapped the tracks in the centre so not one annoying laser of light came through in the morning.  The door was placed around a corner so no sneaky hallway light either. No noise from the street.  None.  (In freakin METROTOWN!) The beds were perfect, the pillows a tad on the soft side for me as a side sleeper, but they worked. I have insomnia and chronic neck and shoulder pain.  I woke up rested and with a happy body. Sure, I could nitpick some other things about the hotel, but if like me actually sleeping is your #1 priority, this is the place.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Angela! So glad to hear you enjoyed your rest and look forward to hosting you again soon. Cheers, Michael

reviews.review_text: Very good stay over Labour Day week and weekend for soccer and to move one of the kids down to UBC.  The hotel is well situated close to the Metrotown mall and a couple of  grocery stores, and was clean and quiet.  Staff were extremely helpful assisting with parking our U Haul trailer.  Hotel is experiencing a labour dispute so housekeeping and catering services were curtailed but good instructions provided for that.  We would stay there again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Mr. Hardy Thank you for your comments and for your support and understanding during this time. I am glad to read that you and your family had a positive experience with us and look forward to welcoming you back soon. Take care. Chris Chris Perna General Manager

reviews.review_text: Room was clean and comfortable. Loved the light up magnifying make up mirror. Housekeeping staff were fantastic!

The Guest service is the best. Leanora (might have spell wrongly), she was really nice. Hilton is lucky to have her. She is so kind and polite. Because of her service, I am going to recommend all our business associates to come to this hotel. Very modern and luxurious room.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Ms. Ho, Thank you so much for letting us know how Leonora  took such good care of your while you were staying with us!  We agree that we are fortunate to have her as part of our team and will share your comments with her. Cheers, Michael

reviews.review_text: Excellent! I visit this hotel on regular basis. The rooms are spacious and clean, staff are very helpful and kind, the food is wonderful. We attended a wedding ceremony and reception recently, it was excellent. I cant think of anything that wasnt good. The atmosphere, the food, staff, parking... Everything was top. Great job Hilton Metrotown, Thank you!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello youare2001na, Thank you very much for your great comments!  We are so pleased you enjoyed yourself at the event and continue to visit us again and again! We look forward to seeing you again soon! Cheers, Michael Director of Operations

reviews.review_text: Excellent front end staff, very helpful service. The room was very nice and clean. Theres a rooftop pool and jacuzzi as well as a gym. We only stayed for one night so we didnt get to use any of the facilities but overall its a very nice hotel.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Tina, Thank you for taking the time to share your great comments from your recent visit and we are pleased that you enjoyed yourself!  Hopefully you can return soon to enjoy more of the property. Cheers, Michael

reviews.review_text: Excellent/Exceptional front desk service from the time Stephanie helped me with my reservations (she took her time to answer all my questions so that I can decide to stay with them), to the time I checked in. They were so kind to have accommodated to all my requests. All the staff including the housekeeping crew was super nice. They made me feel at home and always greeted my family with smiles. Everyone was great, I also want to thank Steve, Arif, Ben, Michael and Stephanie whom I gotten to meet. Great location. Great underground parking, very clean hotel. Pool was heated, the kids had a blast. The beds were super comfy and so was the queen sized sofa bed (quite surprising). Thank you, will sure to return in the future. Btw thank you for the welcome letter addresses to my kids, they were so happy!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Wendy! Thank you so much for the wonderful feedback and I will make sure to share with the team.  We are so very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to hosting you again! Please do not hesitate to reach out directly if you need anything else at Michael.favelle@hilton.com. You guys were a treat for us as well! Cheers, Michael

reviews.review_text: Friendly staff, clean rooms, lovely outdoor hot tub! Super close to SkyTrain which made it worth every dollar spent!
amazing view and room. it was well cleaned, The digital key to access the room is a very good idea. The front desk staff is helpful and welcoming.

My review is a bit late but nevertheless here it is. My family and I have been staying at the Hilton metro town loyally since 2013. I started school at BCIT nearby. In that time we have gotten to know Stephanie and she is such a wonderful person. My father has stayed here as well on business other times and he always raves about the service and friendliness of everyone. Now it is February 2021 We arrived and needed a room. I can t remember her name (it started with a A). But she checked us in very quickly and efficiently. We were also given a room higher up with a view which was amazing. I asked for Stephanie and was told she was working tomorrow. The next morning we were delighted to have a COVID free breakfast and coffees. Thank you so much. Our purpose for this hotel stay was to purchase a vehicle. So that day we went out and bought a   SUV. As we were from out of town, we stayed another night. I got to talk to Stephanie that afternoon which was so nice, and we were given parking additionally for our new SUV which was great. What happened next was incredible.. We had bought a new set of winter tires and rims which were currently sitting inside our new vehicle in the underground parking. At about 10pm our phone in our hotel room rang and it was security. They were concerned for our new SUV and tires and they offered the loading locked garage to park it in for the night. I was happy to hear that they were watching out for us and so I went downstairs and moved our suv. This is something that was above and beyond what we asked for and it was incredible. Also to note that our room was extremely clean and we felt safe during our stay during this pandemic. That was very important to us. I can t rave enough about the Hilton metro town and thank you again for a wonderful stay. See you soon again hopefully!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Taylor, Thank you so much for taking the time to share your wonderful comments with us!  We are so pleased you enjoy staying with us and that the team took great care of you. We are very proud and fortunate to have such dedicated and caring people with us.  We have made sure to share your comments with them. Thank you again and we look forward to hosting you soon. Cheers, Michael

reviews.review_text: We stayed at the Hilton hotel Burnaby for 2 nights and man we were blown away by the customer service. Anthony at the front desk was such an amazing part of our stay. When the wifi didnt work in our room, he upgraded us to a suite down the hall from our original room. The staff were very friendly, and brought us what we needed whether it be a blanket, cutlery or mouthwash! The hotel is also just a walk away from Metrotown if you are into shopping!

Lovely rooms which were clean and spacious. Loved having a desk to work out and lovely views of surrounding Burnaby and the mountains. Staff was friendly, as well as accommodating. Wish parking were free, but it was convenient and we always managed to find an open spot.

Everything was great! Checking in was quick and Ryan was supper helpful! Weve never been to this property and suggest some places. Room was impressive. Completely remodeled, everything was clean, and cant say that theres anything to complain about. Great experience!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for such great feedback on your recent stay with us and for sharing your experience with our team particularly Ryan! We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Chris General Manager

reviews.review_text: Im attending conferences pretty often at Hilton and completely satisfied with organization and complex in overall. Catering services deserve five from five starts. Always clean and full of supplies washrooms. Quite rooms, perfectly set up temperature in. Staff at the front desk more than welcome and acknowledged. Convenient parking options. Location next to public transportation and malls. Hours of attending pretty flexible. I dont have  negative feedback at all. Highly recommended  for conferences and learning sessions.

Close to transit and the mall. From the moment I walked in the front door, the experience was fantastic. I was greeted by friendly efficient staff that gave me all the information needed and answered all my questions. Everything was very clean and neat. The room smelled great. The water pressure in the shower was well above average and was a pleasant surprise in the morning.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Darryl, Thank you for your great comments and I am very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay!  We look forward to seeing you again soon. Cheers, Michael Director of Operations

reviews.review_text: Thank you Hilton - Metrotown - for being so amazing and accommodating to our hockey team.  The rooms were exceptional and clean, the breakfast to go was top notch with so many options including eggs, bacon and hashbrowns in a to-go-container.  They brought items to our room within 5 mins when asked.  Superb service and hotel!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for sharing your wonderful comments. We were fortunate to be able to have you and your team with us and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

reviews.review_text: Great experience at the hotel here in beautiful Burnaby! Food & drinks: Delicious Rooms : 5/5 |

I had to cancel and had missed the deadline for free cancelation by 8 hours. I called and spoke to Massimo. He kindly canceled it and waived the fee. He was professional and helpful. I will definitely book here again!

Beautiful suites that are modern, clean and comfortable.  The cost is a bit high, but the location is great and there are convenience store including the mall on location as well.  We ate at the breakfast buffet which was pricey but delicious. Great for a filling special breakfast/brunch meal for the day.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Jadey, Thank you for your great comments! Cheers, Michael

reviews.review_text: Incredible hotel. Really love the bedding, they felt really cozy. No complain at all.

Stayed here during my short 3-day business trip. Booking last minute was very easy and convenient. The lady at reception was very attentive and friendly. My room was clean and spacious. Overall it was a pleasant stay.
The hotel is located in a very nice area where you can have easy public transportations, restaurants, shops, as well as been secure on re street.
All nice except everything is paid including the parking.

Hilton Vancouver Metrotown was a beautiful hotel in an area right outside of Vancouver. It was a train ride away from the city. Our room was spacious and clean. The room had ample mirror space for easy mornings getting ready. The breakfast was superb and the host at the breakfast area soon became our friend and helped us with our planning for the day. He took a special interest in us and was so sweet. The staff overall was very complimentary. The view was pretty from our room except for the construction site below. I would definitely come stay here again if Im ever in the area again.

It was a great experience staying here. The location is convenient, with excellent accessibility to the mall and restaurants. The front desk team showed great hospitality and offered extra service when there was unexpected situation occurring. Strongly recommend!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Wenlu, Thank you for your kind words. I am very appreciative of you taking the time to recognize the staff and that they made extra efforts to ensuring you were well taken care of. Look forward to welcoming you back soon. Chris

reviews.review_text: Stayed at the Hilton Vancouver Metrotown in Burnaby like 30 plus times over 2 years. I can say they have a very clean, well organized operation. As a business consultant I enjoyed my room always being cleaned when I returned from a hard days work. The bathrooms were spotless and room service was pretty much always on time. The restaurant which I used for breakfast and dinner a lot, had great service albeit the limited menus that hotels have. The front desk staff were very helpful about matters in the hotel and outside events to help me learn what was going on around town. Which outside and in close proximity is a huge ( Metrotown ) mall that has just about every type of store you could want. Lots of restaurants nearby also.  I enjoyed my stay tremendously.

Just wanted to thank Management and Staff for your prompt service and attending to our Thornhill Bolts Soccer Team over the past week. Staff was great and attended to our needs regardless of their current situation they are facing. Great team work with Management Team. Available at all times to provide service. Thanks again, Raffaella
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Raffaela and the Thornhill Bolts It was our pleasure to have you stay with us. We appreciate your kind words and I will ensure that this gets back to the team. We look forward to seeing you all again soon. Best regards, Chris Chris Perna General Manager

reviews.review_text: Very polite and accommodating staff. Rooms were clean and had an updated feel. Outdoor pool was also very clean and enjoyable. I had a perfect stay at this Hilton.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Komal, Thank you so much for your wonderful comments!  We are very pleased you enjoyed your stay wth us and look forward to hosting you again soon! Cheers, Michael

reviews.review_text: We just had two nights at the hotel and it was fantastic. They are very accommodating for each request. They staff was so polite and helpful at every turn. We had trouble with cards and coffee pot and the staff quickly and efficiently helped us out. The hotel is quiet and the beds are so great, the room was clean and spacious and black out curtains the bomb. Parking to front desk to staff at Starbucks to all of the staff we met was top notch. Location is fabulous for us visiting then hockey tourneys. Our favourite restaurants and the mall are within walking distance. Our suite had a small fridge to keep snacks cold. Soaker tub and nice shower head. No allergies at all for dusty rooms. Asked for a quiet room and they accommodated once again. You can t beat it for customer service and cleanliness. Roll away cots are big enough for adult or teen. King suite has plenty of room for cot and pull out queen sofa. Only things I could question is the lack of a fan in the bathroom and size of coffee the little maker puts out. Thankfully I could paddle downstairs in the am for a real grande cup of coffee. Pool was warm but small but for our daughter she was happy. Thanks Hilton for a great stay. Now to buy us some pillows.
Very friendly and helpful staff. Nice rooms and next to the biggest shopping mall. Nice gesture to grab a coffee to go 24 hours. I had a very plesent stay. Will be back soon.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Amir, So glad you enjoyed your stay and look forward to hosting you again soon! Cheers, Michael

reviews.review_text: Really  ice hotel with a fantastic location for shopping at Metrotown.  We got s room up top so we could enjoy the perks of the Opal Lounge.  They provide breakfast, and an eventing light meal.  They also have snacks and drinks all day long. Parking was not a quick in and out because they share with Metrotown parking.  Annoying but a part of the big city Pool is small and. It really exciting for kids. Nice products, the shampoo is awesome. Will stay here again.

Great .hotel! We arrived and was greeted like family. Amy at the front desk was very nice. She stated anything you need just ask for her. We wanted to know where was the skytrain. She gave us perfect ditections. We got there with no problem. Our stay was wonderful.

I came here for a mini work-cation and brought my 16 month old am-staff pitbull with me. I was happy to find a hotel close, but far enough from my home in the suburbs that accommodates larger breed dogs. The location of the hotel was great because Central park was right there to take my little guy out for some exercise each morning, the Metrotown shopping centre was easily accessible as it is literally right across the street, and even though I stuck with the hotels room service menu there are plenty of quality restaurant nearby to indulge in. I was alittle disappointed I didnt get to stay in the room I originally paid for, which was a king bed with a view on one of the top floors, but was super grateful when they upgraded me to a suite on one of the lower pet-friendly floors. My little guy was pleased as well, since we had a few mini-games of fetch along the suites little hallway there. All staff encounters were pleasant and friendly, and I felt well taken care of. The rooms werent cheap, but they werent over the top expensive either, I definitely would recommend if you care more about quality then price. PS- Not a lot of choice for the true vegetarian, but if you still eat fish like me, I highly recommend their Wild BC Salmon and Quinoa salad for dinner, and their Smashed avocado for breakfast in the morning.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Dora Thank you for your review. I am glad to hear that you and your pup had a great stay with us. We are in the midst of working on revamping our menus for Spring 2020 along with our new restaurant concept. I look forward to welcoming you back. Chris

reviews.review_text: Nicest hotel staff I have ever encountered.  Also. If you are interested  in a China Town this is the real deal. This area is not called that. But it is that. Loved the mall than runs around the hotel. Public transit 5 min walk. Benjamin at the front desk and the bell hop whose name I didnt catch and all the hard working room service peeps. They were professional courteous and never seemed put out while working so hard.
This place was awesome! Room was nice and clean and they gave us free delicious cookies when we checked in. Breakfast was amazing. Couldn t ask for anything better.

Top notch service by all of the staff. Clean accommodations, executive perks. Hotel is well cared for, convenient location. Getting in and out of the parking lot can be tricky on a busy weekend as it is shared with Crystal Mall, but nothing to ruin the overall experience.
